extensionDescription.message: Companion extension for Provisions Mod Manager that provides a button on supported websites, like GameBanana, to quickly install mods.

optionsTitle.description: Title of the options page, with version number.

sectionWebsite.descriptions: Title of the Supported Websites section in the options page.

sectionOptions.description: Title of various options for website specific functions.

optionModboy.description: Label of the option to remove links to Modboy's one click installer.

optionPort.description: Label of the option for the WebSocket port to connect to.

labelReset.description: Resets all options to their default value.
